name: sfchronicle
text:
RT @akoseff: What's in that eviction deal for California renters?
* Those who lost income due to pandemic can't be evicted for missed rent between March and August
* They must pay at least 25% of rent between September and January to stay in their homes
More details:
https://t.co/4NAKzkGlUa

name: sfchronicle
